title: hash or a checksum
extract: A checksum is a small-sized datum derived from a block of digital data for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage. ... Checksum functions are related to hash functions, fingerprints, randomization functions, and cryptographic hash functions.
extract_html: A checksum is a small-sized datum derived from a block of digital data for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage. ... Checksum functions are related to hash functions, fingerprints, randomization functions, and cryptographic hash functions.
